thread.title: Former Vodafone CIO Anthony Thomas to join GE India
thread.title_full: Former Vodafone CIO Anthony Thomas to join GE India

title: Former Vodafone CIO Anthony Thomas to join GE India
text: #Anthony Thomas CIO Former Vodafone CIO Anthony Thomas to join GE India Thomas, who was responsible for managing the entire IT estate for all Vodafone India businesses, had recently announced his decision to quit. He joined Vodafone in April 2012. 03 September 2015, 12:25 PM IST Share NEW DELHI: Vodafone India's outgoing Chief Information Officer Anthony Thomas will soon join General Electric (GE) as their India CIO, Onmanorama reported. Thomas, who was responsible for managing the entire IT estate for all Vodafone India businesses, had recently quit. He had joined Vodafone in April 2012. "I am leaving Vodafone on Sept 15 and joining GE on Sept 17," he said. Thomas will report to Kurt.L.Kemmer, CIO, Global Growth Markets at GE and Banmali Agrawala, President and CEO, GE India, and will be based in Bangalore. At GE, Thomas will work closely with GE business partners in the region to understand their local needs and deliver in-market solutions that support GE's global technical strategy. He will also serve as a member of GE Global IT Council and GE India Leadership Council. He will drive the company's IT's talent transformation and leadership pipeline in India.
